title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: June 19, 2023, 01:40:49 AMLast edit: October 31, 2023, 12:53:16 AM by julerz12
content: [Update]7/20/23 Biokript's Round 2 bounty will be extended for another 3 weeks.Whether there would be an additional bounty pool or not is still currently being discussed. I'll update you guys when the Biokript team makes their final decision. Stay tuned.[Update]7/22/23 No additional bounty pool.[Update]8/14/23 Biokript's bounty campaign has officially ended. The main spreadsheet will be finalized by the campaign manager and will bounty rewards will be sent within 1 to 2 weeks after this campaign has ended.[Update]10/11/23 BIOKRIPT UPDATE:Upon rechecking, the team found some suspected bounty campaign cheaters, enrolling multiple accounts. In order to verify and exclude the suspected cheaters within the campaign, a KYC will be required by all the participants.Again, this is a necessary step so any campaign cheaters will not receive the rewards. Once we have all the data, the total rewards calculations on the main spreadsheet will be adjusted accordingly.The KYC form can be found below and on the official telegram group: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdsqKGxoOxm5YQKcHPDJWIJB12Qh9McqYwW-f1AXl6f8MCEaA/viewformTHIS FORM WILL ONLY BE AVAILABLE FOR 1-WEEK.[Update]10/17/23 KYC Form have been closed. The Biokript team will process the KYC applications and draft the final list of participants eligible for the BIOKRIPT token rewards.[Update]10/25/23 The Biokript team has processed the KYC applications and the final list of participants eligible for the BIOKRIPT token rewards is already updated on the main public spreadsheet.[Update]10/31/23 The Biokript bounty rewards have been sent out to those who complied and got approved on the KYC process.https://bscscan.com/tx/0xc37e2d67ff9a1927d862a131e8fc17adc0b31b456bd1caada172f22e6804b94chttps://bscscan.com/tx/0x3b9a20bb81012a9a95872131d8a488cfeacaae650f3a160f5df5fd6281d50903.....[ WEBSITE ]....[ TWITTER ]....[ FACEBOOK ]....[ INSTAGRAM ]....[ TELEGRAM ]....[ REDDIT ]....[ ANN ].....Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
